channel.title: How i make everywhere wildy?
channel.description:
how do i make everywhere in the game wildy except edge bank?
thanks

item.title: How i make everywhere wildy?
item.dc:creator: @Trxkin Trxkin
item.description:
@Trxkin wrote:

Ugh! Don’t you guys ever use the, “Search Button”?

I’ll spoon feed you.

  1. Open your client.java and search for this
public boolean nonWild() {

You will then see some codes, like this:

public boolean nonWild() { 
    if ((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <= 3431)

            || (absX >= 2847 && absX <= 2874 && absY >= 9830 && absY <= 9854)

            || (absX >= 2401 && absX <= 2405 && absY >= 3098 && absY <= 3102)

            || (absX >= 2646 && absX <= 2654 && absY >= 9826 && absY <= 9834)

            || heightLevel == 1) {



        return true;

    } else {

        return false;

    }

}</blockquote>

Now let me explain this to you:

if ((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <= 3431) {

if ((absX >= 3249 means the northwest X coord part of the place you want to be wild would be wild. and the absX that follows is the southeast X coord part of the place you would want to make wild.

&& absY >= 3438 && absY <= 3431) { means that absY which is the southeast Y coord would be wild while the one that follows is the northwest part of the Y coord

Now, let me make this easier…

(absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <= 3431)

Lets change some stuffs so it would be easier…

first absX = X

second absX = XX

first absY = YY

second absY = Y

(X >= 3249 && XX <= 3258 && YY >= 3438 && Y <= 3431)

the first and last set of numbers is the northwest coordinates of the place you would want to make wild wildy

the second and third set of numbers is the southeast coordinates of the place you would want to make wild wildy

Happy i spooned fed you? Next time use the search button.

Creadits to kneistol for explaining this tut.

Read full topic
